document_data.mainbody:
annaah Befling was an inhabitant of the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Hannaah was an aged human woman with a light skin tone, and hair silvered with age cut in an elegant bob. She wore a simple blouse and a corset.
In the , Hannaah Befling was a customer of the Facemaker Fashion boutique. On the day the shops proprietor was attacked by the Bhaalist assassins, Hannaah impatiently waited for her appointment in a queue outside of the shop.
